publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2096 Brian Adam: GM Crop Trials—That the Parliament shares the reservations of the Prime Minister concerning the future of genetically modified foods and urges the Scottish Executive to bring an immediate end to GM crop trials in Scotland.
S1M-2096 GM Crop Trials (lodged on 31 July 2001) Colin Campbell*, Fergus Ewing*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Alex Neil*

S1M-2096 Brian Adam: GM Crop Trials—That the Parliament shares the reservations of the Prime Minister concerning the future of genetically modified foods and urges the Scottish Executive to bring an immediate end to GM crop trials in Scotland. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Fergus Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Fiona Hyslop, Michael Russell, Christine Grahame
S1M-2096 GM Crop Trials (lodged on 31 July 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2096 GM Crop Trials (lodged on 31 July 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-2096 GM Crop Trials (lodged on 31 July 2001) Irene McGugan*, Alasdair Morgan*

S1M-2096 Brian Adam: GM Crop Trials-That the Parliament shares the reservations of the Prime Minister concerning the future of genetically modified foods and urges the Scottish Executive to bring an immediate end to GM crop trials in Scotland. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Fergus Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Fiona Hyslop, Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Irene McGugan, Alasdair Morgan

S1M-2096 Brian Adam: GM Crop Trials—That the Parliament shares the reservations of the Prime Minister concerning the future of genetically modified foods and urges the Scottish Executive to bring an immediate end to GM crop trials in Scotland. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Fergus Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Fiona Hyslop, Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Irene McGugan, Alasdair Morgan

S1M-2096 Brian Adam: GM Crop Trials-That the Parliament shares the reservations of the Prime Minister concerning the future of genetically modified foods and urges the Scottish Executive to bring an immediate end to GM crop trials in Scotland. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Fergus Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Fiona Hyslop, Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Irene McGugan, Alasdair Morgan
S1M-2096 GM Crop Trials (lodged on 31 July 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*

S1M-2096 Brian Adam: GM Crop Trials-That the Parliament shares the reservations of the Prime Minister concerning the future of genetically modified foods and urges the Scottish Executive to bring an immediate end to GM crop trials in Scotland. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Fergus Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Fiona Hyslop, Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Irene McGugan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Duncan Hamilton
